channel.title: PI shop duping
channel.description: How can i fix this shop dupe? When there is a lot of junk in a shop, and you put a rare item in there, then buy the rare item, you can buy multiples of it. It only happens every once in a while, but its ruining my economy so bad. Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: PI shop duping
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

Yeah, thats how the dupe works. But i cant seem to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: PI shop duping
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

are you sure they can buy it mutliple times? Ive never heard of this before but still what you can do is this…

where the server’s shop handling methods are for the buying

see if it has like an if statement that

makes sure you cant buy 5 or 10 as long as theres not that many in stock.

If it does then its probably a different dupe.

and if someones told you thats how they did it then there probably lieing.

Read full topic
